column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Buttery Mashed Potatoes - these were way too thick for my taste.  You are already eating a heavy steak
column2: a lighter silky mashed potato would be a less filling side.  The flavor was fine
column3: but I just couln't get past consistency and we ended up leaving most of it.  If you are looking for one side dish that can feed an entire table
